text: Hugh McKean is a state representative from Loveland, Colorado. A Republican, McKean represents Colorado House of Representatives District 51, which encompasses Loveland and the surrounding area. He was first elected in 2016.Ballotpedia. Hugh McKean. Viewed: 2017-01-16. Before his election as a state representative, McKean served as a City Councilor in Loveland. == References == ==External links== * State House website Category:21st-century American politicians Category:Living people Category:Members of the Colorado House of Representatives Category:Colorado Republicans Category:People from Loveland, Colorado Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Hugh McKean
